pages.text:
Home
Squarebird Development
2024-10-02T12:15:04+00:00
Hello Bristol
Scroll
Your New Favourite
Welcome to White Bear, your new go-to spot. Hanging with friends? Looking for a comedy club? Want a selection of drinks? We’ve got you. Quirky décor, a sunny ‘bear’ garden, a well stocked bar, friendly faces, all in the heart of Bristol.
Open every evening until midnight, we’re here for you. Find us at the top of St Michael’s Hill, just look out for the massive white bear – seriously, you really can’t miss it.
Catch you later.
Where To Find Us
133 St Michael’s Hill, Bristol BS2 8BS
View on Google Maps here

Tuesday
Wednesday

Friday

Sunday

4pm – 12am
4pm – 12am

12pm – 12am
12pm – 12am
12pm – 12am
Whats On
Upcoming
Upcoming
Show All
You’ll never be bored at White Bear. We’re more than a pub, that’s for sure. Join us for sports (on multiple huge screens), comedy clubs, and more. Get the details below. It’s a no brainer.
upcoming
Pub Quiz
It's time to put your brain to the test. The UoB Quiz Society are back and hosting weekly pub quizzes, right here at White Bear!
Every Sunday, starting from 7 - 9pm. Everyone welcome. As always. (£2 cash entry).
upcoming
Premiere League 2024/25 season begins
We'll be showing the matches at the WB, so come on down and cheer on your team. August 2024 - May 2025!
upcoming
WrestleMania 41 – LIVE from Las Vegas
Join us for this iconic event in the Wrestling calendar.
Night One: Saturday 19th April 12am UK Time until 5am (approximately)
Night Two: Sunday 20th April 12am UK Time until 5am (approximately)
Tickets are £2 for one night or £5 for both nights.
£2 ticket gets you entry and a free bag of popcorn, whilst £5 ticket gets you entry to both nights, a free bag of popcorn for both nights and a free pint on both nights
Buy your tickets:
Night One
https://skiddle.com/e/40653170
Night Two
https://skiddle.com/e/40653186
Both Nights
https://skiddle.com/e/40653190
upcoming
Pub Quiz
It's time to put your brain to the test. The UoB Quiz Society are back and hosting weekly pub quizzes, right here at White Bear!
Every Sunday, starting from 7 - 9pm. Everyone welcome. As always. (£2 cash entry).

Premiere League 2024/25 season begins
We'll be showing the matches at the WB, so come on down and cheer on your team. August 2024 - May 2025!

WrestleMania 41 – LIVE from Las Vegas
Join us for this iconic event in the Wrestling calendar.
Night One: Saturday 19th April 12am UK Time until 5am (approximately)
Night Two: Sunday 20th April 12am UK Time until 5am (approximately)
Tickets are £2 for one night or £5 for both nights.
£2 ticket gets you entry and a free bag of popcorn, whilst £5 ticket gets you entry to both nights, a free bag of popcorn for both nights and a free pint on both nights
Buy your tickets:
Night One
https://skiddle.com/e/40653170
Night Two
https://skiddle.com/e/40653186
Both Nights
https://skiddle.com/e/40653190
Who’s in the bear’s kitchen?
What pairs well with drinks and good company? Even better food. We like to switch things up here at White Bear and feature some top chefs and food creators from time to time. Find out who is in the White Bear kitchen below. Cya for a pint and grub soon.
October onwards
Could it be you?
Could it be you?
Want to join forces with an iconic Bristol pub to serve your delicious grub? Pop your details in the form below and we’ll get back to you…
Get in Touch
Got a question for us about private bookings or something not covered here? Fill in the form with your enquiry. We’ll get back to you soon.
All the best,
WB.
